biotools.summary: Algorithm for the inference of gene regulatory networks from expression data. It decomposes the prediction of a regulatory network between p genes into p different regression problems. In each of the regression problems, the expression pattern of one of the genes (target gene) is predicted from the expression patterns of all the other genes (input genes), using tree-based ensemble methods Random Forests or Extra-Trees.

bioschemas.name: GENIE3
